definition[0]: relating to the health or state of someone’s mind
example[0]: The centre provides help for people suffering from mental illness.
example[1]: Stress has an effect on both your physical and mental health.
definition[1]: relating to the mind and thinking, or happening only in the mind
example[3]: You need to develop a positive mental attitude.
